titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter conveying a report brought on a boat from al Katife [Al Qaţīf] of a battle between Ottoman Turkish and Wahabi forces near the town of Turba on or around 15 February 1815. The Ottoman forces, commanded by Mohamed Ali Pacha, defeated the Wahabi troops led by Faysull [Faisal bin Saud], brother of Abdella ben Saud [Abdullah bin Saud ], the Wahabi Chief.In reviewing the report Bruce comments on his approval of the possibility of the Ottomans curtailing Wahabi power and placing garrisons on the Gulf coast, which he believes will reduce pirate activity.
